item.description: The disturbing truth is that there’s probably more sincerity than not in American politics. We may not want to believe it, but most of the people in charge say what they mean and mean what they say.
item.source:markdown: The disturbing truth is that there’s probably more sincerity than not in American politics. We may not want to believe it, but most of the people in charge say what they mean and mean what they say.

item.description: Yes Apple is a soul crushing tech monopoly. And some group inside Apple did something creative that inspired debate and for some revulsion, and in the name of uniformity in artistic expression, the creativity was crushed. And Steve Jobs would’ve loved it, btw, imho.
item.source:markdown: Yes Apple is a soul crushing tech monopoly. And some group inside Apple did something creative that inspired debate and for some revulsion, and in the name of uniformity in artistic expression, the creativity was crushed. And Steve Jobs would’ve loved it, btw, imho.

item.description: Despite being defeated, the Knicks received a standing ovation in the game’s final seconds — a token of appreciation from a loyal fanbase that enjoyed one of the most memorable playoff runs in team history.

item.description: Perplexity.ai is a competitor of ChatGPT. I asked about RSS and the NY Times role in RSS. This is a good test, because most reporters leave the NYT out of the story.
item.source:markdown: [Perplexity.ai](http://Perplexity.ai) is a competitor of ChatGPT. I asked about RSS and the NY Times role in RSS. This is a good test, because most reporters leave the NYT out of the story.

item.description: Stephen Wolfram on chatgpt. Why it's good at conversation but not at science. The agrees with what I've seen. But it's very useful at telling you what other humans do in situations like the one you describe.
item.source:markdown: Stephen Wolfram on chatgpt. Why it's good at conversation but not at science. The agrees with what I've seen. But it's very useful at telling you what other humans do in situations like the one you describe.

item.description: I was really angry when the NYT fired Donald McNeil, who had done so much to keep us informed about Covid. If that's what the NYT isn't going to do, going forward, I'm all for it.
item.source:markdown: I was really angry when the NYT fired Donald McNeil, who had done so much to keep us informed about Covid. If that's what the NYT isn't going to do, going forward, I'm all for it.
